sentences.sContent: The famous old plan of counting sheep jumping over a stile has never served my turn.
sentences.sContent_eng: The famous old plan of counting sheep jumping over a stile has never served my turn.
sentences.sCn: 那个有名的数跳过篱笆墙台阶的山羊的老办法对我从来都不起作用。

trans.tranOther: a set of steps that helps people climb over a fence in the countryside
